description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Pizza + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Pizza + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small pear, peeled, cored, finely diced
20g leftover* cooked lean chicken breast, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: To make chicken pizza, preheat grill to high. Spread muffin halves with tomato paste. Top with chicken, capsicum and cheese. Grill until cheese is melted and golden. Cool. Serve with cherry tomatoes.
Snack: Process raspberries to a puree. Swirl puree through yoghurt in an airtight container. Top with extra raspberries.

HowToTip.tipText: Store remaining muffins in an airtight container in the fridge.

recipeInstructions.text: Muffins: To make pear & carrot muffins, preheat oven to 180oC/160oC fan-forced. Line a 12-hole 1/3 cup capacity muffin pan with paper cases. Place flour in a large bowl and stir in sugar, carrot and three-quarters of the pear. Whisk egg and milk together in a jug. Add to flour mixture and stir until just combined. Divide mixture among paper cases. Top muffins with remaining pear. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Set aside to cool for 5 minutes. Remove from pan and transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Makes 12. Place 1 muffin in lunch box.
